body_html:
As long as the first python library path is valid, if you run
yes "" | ./configure the script executes unattended, without any need for user interaction.
Therefore, I am not too much in favor of merging this. @yifeif @martinwicke for their opinions.

@andreas-eberle would the suggested execution method work for you?

body:
As long as the first python library path is valid, if you run 
`yes "" | ./configure` the script executes unattended, without any need for user interaction.
Therefore, I am not too much in favor of merging this. @yifeif @martinwicke for their opinions.

@andreas-eberle would the suggested execution method work for you?
